Level 2 Annotation#

Dental Epithelial Progenitors#

This cluster is annotated base on the time point, mainly E12.5-E15.5, with high development potential

Enamel organ layers#

These cells are differentiated, expressed the OEE markers (Slco4a1, Th), IEE markers (Thbd, Jph4) and SI markers (Sfrp5) [Krivanek et al., 2020].

Stellate reticulum#

C12-3 expressed the SR markers (Vatl1, Fam19a4) [Krivanek et al., 2020].

Pre-ameloblast#

Pre-ameloblast markers (Col22a1, Vwde, Kif5c [Krivanek et al., 2020]) are expressed in this cluster.

Secretory ameloblast#

We named this cluster base on the study described in [Hermans et al., 2022].

Mature ameloblast#

Mature ameloblast markers (Odam, Klk4, Amtn [Hermans et al., 2022]) are expressed in this cluster.
